game.title: The Lost Temple Quest
game.objective: Explore, retrieve the ancient artifact, and secure it for your village
game.description: A quest of great danger awaits: discover the abandoned temple, overcome its challenges, and bring back its legendary power to Oakwood Village. Remember the tales of those who tried but failed – can you be the one to succeed?
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, the artifact's might, and village honor

task.objective: Gather information on temple location from Elder Thorne at Oakwood Village hall.
task.description: Uncover the temple's whereabouts with Elder Thorne's guidance. Be cautious in your inquiries!

task.objective: Navigate the Dark Forest to reach the temple entrance.
task.description: Beware of wildlife and hidden dangers as you make your way through the forest. Follow the signs carefully.

task.objective: Solve the temple's puzzles and avoid traps to reach the artifact chamber.
task.description: Use your wit and skill to unravel the temple's secrets, but stay alert for any threats.

task.objective: Seize the artifact and safely return it to Oakwood Village.
task.description: Battle any rivals and protect the artifact – your village's future depends on it!
